question: Which of the following is not correct about Monosodium glutamate? 1.It is an amino acid found in your body and most foods. 2.It is a flavour enhancer. 3.It causes a condition called Chinese restaurant syndrome.
explanation: MSG is a flavour enhancer commonly added to Chinese food, canned vegetables, soups, and processed meats. It is claimed that MSG can cause asthma and even brain damage.
